verses.verse: And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, there are <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> shall not <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> after it has <S%G2064>come<s%> with <S%G1411>power.<s%>"

And <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>later,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> with Him <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G399>brought<s%> them up to a <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> by <S%G2398>themselves.<s%> <S%G3441><s%> And He was <S%G3339>transfigured<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them;

and His <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G4744>radiant<s%> and <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G3022>white,<s%> as <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1102>launderer<s%> on <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3021>whiten<s%> them.
And <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to them <S%G4862>along<s%> with <S%G3475>Moses;<s%> and they were <S%G4814>talking<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for us to be <S%G5602>here;<s%> and let us <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacles,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> for You, and <S%G1520>one<s%> for <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> for <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%>"
For he did not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> to <S%G611>answer;<s%> for they <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1630>terrified.<s%>

<S%G2532>Then<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G1096>formed,<s%> <S%G1982>overshadowing<s%> them, and a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> out of the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is My <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G191>listen<s%> to Him!"

And <S%G1819>all<s%> at <S%G1819>once<s%> they <S%G4017>looked<s%> <S%G4017>around<s%> and <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> with them <S%G3765>anymore,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>

And as they were <S%G2597>coming<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> He <S%G1291>gave<s%> them <S%G1291>orders<s%> not to <S%G1334>relate<s%> to <S%G3367>anyone<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> they had <S%G3708>seen,<s%> <S%G1487>until<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3752><s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> should <S%G450>rise<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And they <S%G2902>seized<s%> upon that <S%G3056>statement,<s%> <S%G4802>discussing<s%> with <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G450>rising<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> might <S%G1510>mean.<s%>
And they <S%G1905>asked<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> ["Why is it] that the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%>?"

And He <S%G5346>said<s%> to them, <S%G2243>"Elijah<s%> does <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G600>restore<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%> And [yet] <S%G4459>how<s%> is it <S%G1125>written<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> that He should <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> and be <S%G1847>treated<s%> with <S%G1847>contempt<s%>?

"But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> has <S%G2532>indeed<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> and they <S%G4160>did<s%> to him <S%G3745>whatever<s%> they <S%G2309>wished,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written<s%> of him."

And when they <S%G2064>came<s%> [back] to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> they <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G4183>large<s%> <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> them, and [some] <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4802>arguing<s%> with them.
And <S%G2117>immediately,<s%> when the <S%G3956>entire<s%> <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him, they were <S%G1568>amazed,<s%> and [began] <S%G4370>running<s%> up to <S%G782>greet<s%> Him.
And He <S%G1905>asked<s%> them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> are you <S%G4802>discussing<s%> with them?"

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> I <S%G5342>brought<s%> You my <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G2192>possessed<s%> with a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> which makes him <S%G216>mute;<s%>

and <S%G3699>whenever<s%> it <S%G2638>seizes<s%> him, it <S%G4486>dashes<s%> him [to the ground] and he <S%G875>foams<s%> [at the mouth,] and <S%G5149>grinds<s%> his <S%G3599>teeth,<s%> and <S%G3583>stiffens<s%> out. And I <S%G3004>told<s%> Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> it out, and they <S%G2480>could<s%> not [do it. "]

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> them and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5599>"O<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> <S%G2193>how<s%> <S%G2193>long<s%> <S%G4219><s%> shall I be with you? <S%G2193>How<s%> <S%G2193>long<s%> <S%G4219><s%> shall I <S%G430>put<s%> up with you? <S%G5342>Bring<s%> him to Me!"

And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> the boy to Him. And when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him, <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G4952>threw<s%> him into a <S%G4952>convulsion,<s%> and <S%G4098>falling<s%> to the <S%G1093>ground,<s%> he [began] <S%G2947>rolling<s%> <S%G2947>about<s%> and <S%G875>foaming<s%> [at the mouth.]

And He <S%G1905>asked<s%> his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G4214>"How<s%> <S%G5550>long<s%> has <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G1096>happening<s%> to him?" And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> "From <S%G3812>childhood.<s%>

"And it has <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G906>thrown<s%> him <S%G2532>both<s%> into the <S%G4442>fire<s%> and into the <S%G5204>water<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> him. But <S%G1487>if<s%> You <S%G1410>can<s%> do <S%G5100>anything,<s%> <S%G4697>take<s%> <S%G4697>pity<s%> on us and <S%G997>help<s%> us!"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, " <S%G1487>'If<s%> You <S%G1410>can!<s%>' <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1415>possible<s%> to him who <S%G4100>believes.<s%>"
<S%G2117>Immediately<s%> the boy's <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out and [began] <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I do <S%G4100>believe;<s%> <S%G997>help<s%> my <S%G570>unbelief.<s%>"

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that a <S%G3793>crowd<s%> was <S%G1998>rapidly<s%> <S%G1998>gathering,<s%> He <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to it, "You <S%G2974>deaf<s%> and <S%G216>dumb<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> I <S%G2004>command<s%> you, <S%G1831>come<s%> out of him and do not <S%G1525>enter<s%> him <S%G3371>again.<s%>"

And after <S%G2896>crying<s%> out and <S%G4682>throwing<s%> him into <S%G4183>terrible<s%> <S%G4682>convulsions,<s%> it <S%G1831>came<s%> out; and [the boy] <S%G1096>became<s%> so <S%G5616>much<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G3498>corpse<s%> that <S%G4183>most<s%> [of them] <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He is <S%G599>dead!<s%>"
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2902>took<s%> him by the <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G1453>raised<s%> him; and he <S%G450>got<s%> up.

And when He had <S%G1525>come<s%> into [the] <S%G3624>house,<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> [began] <S%G1905>questioning<s%> Him <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G3739>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> we not <S%G1544>cast<s%> it out?"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G1085>kind<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> out by <S%G3762>anything<s%> but <S%G4335>prayer.<s%>"

And from <S%G2547>there<s%> they <S%G1831>went<s%> out and [began] to <S%G3899>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and He was <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> for <S%G5100>anyone<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> [about it.]

For He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G3004>telling<s%> them, "The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is to be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> into the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> and they will <S%G615>kill<s%> Him; and when He has been <S%G615>killed,<s%> He will <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>later.<s%>"
But they did not <S%G50>understand<s%> [this] <S%G4487>statement,<s%> and they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G1905>ask<s%> Him.

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum;<s%> and when He was in the <S%G3614>house,<s%> He [began] to <S%G1905>question<s%> them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> were you <S%G1260>discussing<s%> on the <S%G3598>way<s%>?"

But they <S%G4623>kept<s%> <S%G4623>silent,<s%> for on the <S%G3598>way<s%> they had <S%G1256>discussed<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> [of them was] the <S%G3173>greatest.<s%>

And <S%G2523>sitting<s%> <S%G2523>down,<s%> He <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>wants<s%> to be <S%G4413>first,<s%> he shall be <S%G2078>last<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> and <S%G1249>servant<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>"
And <S%G2983>taking<s%> a <S%G3813>child,<s%> He <S%G2476>set<s%> him <S%G1722>before<s%> <S%G3319><s%> them, and <S%G1723>taking<s%> him in His <S%G1723>arms,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them,

<S%G3739>"Whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> <S%G5108>like<s%> <S%G5108>this<s%> in My <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> Me; and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> Me does not <S%G1209>receive<s%> Me, but Him who <S%G649>sent<s%> Me."

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G1544>casting<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> in Your <S%G3686>name,<s%> and we tried to <S%G2967>hinder<s%> him <S%G3754>because<s%> he was not <S%G190>following<s%> us."

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Do not <S%G2967>hinder<s%> him, for there is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G4160>perform<s%> a <S%G1411>miracle<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> and be <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G5035>soon<s%> <S%G5035>afterward<s%> to <S%G2551>speak<s%> <S%G2551>evil<s%> of Me.
"For he <S%G3739>who<s%> is not <S%G2596>against<s%> us is for us.

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4222>gives<s%> you a <S%G4221>cup<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> to <S%G4222>drink<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> of your <S%G3686>name<s%> as [followers] of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, he shall not <S%G622>lose<s%> his <S%G3408>reward.<s%>

"And <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4624>causes<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3398>ones<s%> who <S%G4100>believe<s%> to <S%G4624>stumble,<s%> it would be <S%G2570>better<s%> <S%G3123><s%> for him <S%G1487>if,<s%> with a <S%G3684>heavy<s%> <S%G3458>millstone<s%> <S%G4029>hung<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> his <S%G5137>neck,<s%> he had been <S%G906>cast<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> your <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G4624>causes<s%> you to <S%G4624>stumble,<s%> <S%G609>cut<s%> it <S%G609>off;<s%> it is <S%G2570>better<s%> for you to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2948>crippled,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> your <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> into <S%G1067>hell,<s%> into the <S%G762>unquenchable<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%>
<S%G3699>[where<s%> their <S%G4663>worm<s%> does not <S%G5053>die,<s%> and the <S%G4442>fire<s%> is not <S%G4570>quenched.<s%>]

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> your <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4624>causes<s%> you to <S%G4624>stumble,<s%> <S%G609>cut<s%> it <S%G609>off;<s%> it is <S%G2570>better<s%> for you to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G5560>lame,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> your <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> to be <S%G906>cast<s%> into <S%G1067>hell,<s%>
<S%G3699>[where<s%> their <S%G4663>worm<s%> does not <S%G5053>die,<s%> and the <S%G4442>fire<s%> is not <S%G4570>quenched.<s%>]

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> your <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4624>causes<s%> you to <S%G4624>stumble,<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> it out; it is <S%G2570>better<s%> for you to <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3442>one<s%> <S%G3442>eye,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> to be <S%G1544>cast<s%> into <S%G1067>hell,<s%>
<S%G3699>where<s%> their <S%G4663>worm<s%> does not <S%G5053>die,<s%> and the <S%G4442>fire<s%> is not <S%G4570>quenched.<s%>
"For <S%G3956>everyone<s%> will be <S%G233>salted<s%> with <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

<S%G217>"Salt<s%> is <S%G2570>good;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G217>salt<s%> <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G358>unsalty,<s%> with <S%G5101>what<s%> will you <S%G741>make<s%> it <S%G741>salty<s%> [again]? <S%G2192>Have<s%> <S%G217>salt<s%> in <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> and be at <S%G1514>peace<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>"
